harkadventurer.control

Class FileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • harkadventurer.control.FileLoader

  • public class FileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    FileLoader objects read Character and Ability txt files and convert them into characters and abilities. The characters are sorted into teams. The exact nature of the characters, abilities and teams created depends on the factories input at construction.
    Since:
    10/10/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FileLoader(CharacterFactory inCharFact, AbilityFactory inAbilFact, TeamManager inManager)
      Constructs a new FileLoader that uses the specified factories.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileLoader

        public FileLoader(CharacterFactory inCharFact,
          AbilityFactory inAbilFact,
          TeamManager inManager)
        Constructs a new FileLoader that uses the specified factories.
        Parameters:
        inCharFact - The desired Character Factory
        inAbilFact - The desired Ability Factory
        inManager - The desired Team Manager

    • Method Detail

      • readAbilities

        public java.util.LinkedList<Ability> readAbilities(java.lang.String filename)
                                            throws AbilityException
        Reads an abilities file. The abilities are constructed by the factory, placed into a linked list and returned.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        A list of abilities
        Throws:
        AbilityException - If the file cannot be loaded or has invalid formatting

      • readCharacters

        public java.util.LinkedList<Team> readCharacters(java.lang.String filename,
                                        java.util.LinkedList<Ability> abilities)
                                          throws CharacterException
        Reads a characters file. The characters are constructed by the factory and sorted into teams by the team manager. The teams are then returned. Abilities must be constructed first.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to be read
        abilities - The list of valid abilities
        Returns:
        A list of teams containing the loaded characters
        Throws:
        CharacterException - If the file fails to load, has invalid formatting or any of the characters have abilities that don't exist
